name: Collide (Color Slide)
description:
Collide is the game of sliding and blending colors. The unique gameplay will challenge your problem-solving skills, as well as encourage creativity and strategic expression.

Each level consists of colored tiles placed on an 8x8 grid. Navigate the tiles around the board to fill their corresponding targets. Some tiles blend into new colors, while others can assist each other to their targets.

Colors blend based on the subtractive color mixing principles of art and design. Blending tiles strategically is key to success.

Do you prefer relaxing puzzles or mind-bending brainteasers? Unlock level packs in the order you choose, and replay levels to discover perfect solutions. How many levels can you solve?

Features
-----------
+ Unique gameplay
+ Colorblind setting
+ 160 free levels
+ Replay levels to find flawless solutions
+ Hints available for every level
